sentences.en: My classroom is on the first floor.
sentences.zh: 我的教室在一楼。

sentences.en: The library is located on the first floor of the building.
sentences.zh: 图书馆位于这栋楼的一楼。

sentences.en: Our classroom is on the second floor.
sentences.zh: 我们的教室在二楼。

sentences.en: She lives on the second floor of the building.
sentences.zh: 她住在这栋楼的二楼。

sentences.en: We can ask the teacher for help in the teachers' office.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在教师办公室向老师寻求帮助。

sentences.en: My English teacher is correcting homework in the teachers' office now.
sentences.zh: 我的英语老师现在正在教师办公室批改作业。

sentences.en: I often go to the library to read books.
sentences.zh: 我经常去图书馆看书。

sentences.en: The library has a lot of interesting books.
sentences.zh: 图书馆有很多有趣的书。

sentences.en: We played games in the playground.
sentences.zh: 我们在操场上玩游戏。

sentences.en: The children are running on the playground.
sentences.zh: 孩子们正在操场上跑步。

sentences.en: We often have computer classes in the computer room.
sentences.zh: 我们经常在电脑室上计算机课。

sentences.en: The computer room is a place with many computers.
sentences.zh: 电脑室是一个有很多电脑的地方。

sentences.en: We draw pictures in the art room.
sentences.zh: 我们在美术室画画。

sentences.en: The art room has many colorful paints.
sentences.zh: 美术室有许多彩色颜料。

sentences.en: We can sing songs in the music room.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在音乐教室唱歌。

sentences.en: The music room has many musical instruments.
sentences.zh: 音乐教室有很多乐器。

sentences.en: The bookstore is next to the bank.
sentences.zh: 书店在银行旁边。

sentences.en: My seat is next to the window.
sentences.zh: 我的座位在窗户旁边。

sentences.en: I need to finish my homework tonight.
sentences.zh: 我今晚需要完成我的家庭作业。

sentences.en: Doing homework helps me review what I learned.
sentences.zh: 做家庭作业帮助我复习所学的知识。

sentences.en: We are in the same class.
sentences.zh: 我们在同一个班级。

sentences.en: My class starts at eight o'clock.
sentences.zh: 我的课八点开始。

sentences.en: There are forty students in the classroom.
sentences.zh: 教室里有四十名学生。

sentences.en: My mom is forty years old this year.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈今年四十岁了。

sentences.en: This is the way to the park.
sentences.zh: 这是去公园的路。

sentences.en: She found a new way to solve the problem.
sentences.zh: 她找到了一个解决问题的新方法。

sentences.en: I eat eggs and milk for breakfast.
sentences.zh: 我早餐吃鸡蛋和牛奶。

sentences.en: Breakfast is the first meal of the day.
sentences.zh: 早餐是一天中的第一顿饭。

sentences.en: I have an English class every Monday.
sentences.zh: 我每周一有一节英语课。

sentences.en: English class helps me learn new words.
sentences.zh: 英语课帮助我学习新单词。

sentences.en: I usually have lunch at school.
sentences.zh: 我通常在学校吃午饭。

sentences.en: Lunch is an important meal of the day.
sentences.zh: 午饭是一天中重要的一餐。

sentences.en: I love going to music class.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢去上音乐课。

sentences.en: We sing and dance in music class.
sentences.zh: 我们在音乐课上唱歌跳舞。

sentences.en: We have PE class on Monday.
sentences.zh: 我们星期一有体育课。

sentences.en: I like PE class because I can play basketball.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢体育课，因为我可以打篮球。

sentences.en: We usually have dinner at 7 pm.
sentences.zh: 我们通常在晚上7点吃晚餐。

sentences.en: My favorite food for dinner is fish.
sentences.zh: 我晚餐最喜欢的食物是鱼。

sentences.en: I usually get up at 7 o'clock in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我通常早上7点起床。

sentences.en: She needs to get up early tomorrow for the trip.
sentences.zh: 她明天需要早起去旅行。

sentences.en: I go to school every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上上学。

sentences.en: She likes to go to school by bike.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢骑自行车上学。

sentences.en: I want to go home after school.
sentences.zh: 放学后我想回家。

sentences.en: She will go home by bus.
sentences.zh: 她将乘公交车回家。

sentences.en: I usually go to bed at 9 o'clock.
sentences.zh: 我通常九点上床睡觉。

sentences.en: She needs to go to bed early tonight.
sentences.zh: 她今晚需要早点上床睡觉。

sentences.en: The game is over.
sentences.zh: 游戏结束了。

sentences.en: Class is over now.
sentences.zh: 现在下课了。

sentences.en: I am doing homework now.
sentences.zh: 我现在正在做作业。

sentences.en: It is raining outside now.
sentences.zh: 现在外面正在下雨。

sentences.en: It is nine o'clock in the morning.
sentences.zh: 现在是早上九点钟。

sentences.en: She usually wakes up at six o'clock.
sentences.zh: 她通常六点钟醒来。

sentences.en: The kid is playing in the park.
sentences.zh: 这个孩子正在公园里玩。

sentences.en: My little brother is a cute kid.
sentences.zh: 我的弟弟是个可爱的孩子。

sentences.en: There are thirty days in April, June, September, and November.
sentences.zh: 四月、六月、九月和十一月有三十天。

sentences.en: My grandmother is thirty years older than my mother.
sentences.zh: 我的祖母比我母亲大三十岁。

sentences.en: Hurry up, or we'll be late for school.
sentences.zh: 快点，否则我们上学要迟到了。

sentences.en: She told me to hurry up with my homework.
sentences.zh: 她让我快点做我的家庭作业。

sentences.en: Come on, let's finish the homework together.
sentences.zh: 加油，让我们一起完成作业吧。

sentences.en: When you feel tired, just say 'come on' to yourself.
sentences.zh: 当你感到累的时候，就对自己说“加油”。

sentences.en: Could you wait just a minute?
sentences.zh: 你能等一下吗？

sentences.en: He asked me to hold on just a minute.
sentences.zh: 他让我稍等一下。

sentences.en: It's cold outside, so I wear a thick coat.
sentences.zh: 外面很冷，所以我穿了一件厚外套。

sentences.en: Drinking cold water in summer makes me feel cool.
sentences.zh: 夏天喝冷水让我感觉很凉爽。

sentences.en: The ice cream is cool on a hot day.
sentences.zh: 大热天的冰淇淋很凉爽。

sentences.en: He wears a cool hat to the party.
sentences.zh: 他戴着一顶很酷的帽子去参加派对。

sentences.en: A cup of hot tea can keep you warm.
sentences.zh: 一杯热茶能让你暖和。

sentences.en: The sun feels warm on my face.
sentences.zh: 太阳照在我脸上感觉很温暖。

sentences.en: The sun is hot in summer.
sentences.zh: 夏天的太阳很热。

sentences.en: I like hot coffee in the morning.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢早上喝热咖啡。

sentences.en: It's a sunny day today.
sentences.zh: 今天是晴朗的一天。

sentences.en: We can go to the park on a sunny morning.
sentences.zh: 我们可以在晴朗的早上一起去公园。

sentences.en: It is windy today, so I need to close the window.
sentences.zh: 今天有风，所以我需要关上窗户。

sentences.en: The windy weather makes the leaves fall from the trees.
sentences.zh: 大风天气使树叶从树上落下来。

sentences.en: It is cloudy today, so we might need an umbrella.
sentences.zh: 今天是多云的天气，所以我们可能需要一把伞。

sentences.en: The sky looks cloudy, and the sun is hidden behind the clouds.
sentences.zh: 天空看起来是多云的，太阳躲在云层后面。

sentences.en: It is snowy today, so we wear warm coats.
sentences.zh: 今天下雪了，所以我们穿上了暖和的外套。

sentences.en: Children like to play outside on snowy days.
sentences.zh: 孩子们喜欢在下雪天去外面玩。

sentences.en: It is rainy today, so I need an umbrella.
sentences.zh: 今天下雨了，所以我需要一把伞。

sentences.en: We can't play outside because it's rainy.
sentences.zh: 因为下雨，我们不能在外面玩。

sentences.en: We like to play outside.
sentences.zh: 我们喜欢在外面玩。

sentences.en: The cat is sleeping outside the house.
sentences.zh: 猫正在房子外面睡觉。

sentences.en: You should be careful when crossing the road.
sentences.zh: 过马路时你应该小心。

sentences.en: Be careful not to spill the water.
sentences.zh: 小心不要把水洒出来。

sentences.en: What's the weather like today?
sentences.zh: 今天天气怎么样？

sentences.en: I check the weather forecast every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上查看天气预报。

sentences.en: New York is a big city in the United States.
sentences.zh: 纽约是美国的一个大城市。

sentences.en: Many people dream of visiting New York.
sentences.zh: 很多人梦想着参观纽约。

sentences.en: How about going for a walk?
sentences.zh: 去散步怎么样？

sentences.en: How about some coffee?
sentences.zh: 来点咖啡怎么样？

sentences.en: She earned a degree in computer science.
sentences.zh: 她获得了计算机科学学位。

sentences.en: To get this job, you need at least a bachelor's degree.
sentences.zh: 要得到这份工作，你至少需要一个学士学位。

sentences.en: The world is a beautiful place.
sentences.zh: 世界是一个美丽的地方。

sentences.en: We should protect the world.
sentences.zh: 我们应该保护世界。

sentences.en: London is the capital city of the United Kingdom.
sentences.zh: 伦敦是英国的首都。

sentences.en: Many people visit London to see famous places like Big Ben.
sentences.zh: 许多人去伦敦参观大本钟等著名景点。

sentences.en: Moscow is the capital city of Russia.
sentences.zh: 莫斯科是俄罗斯的首都。

sentences.en: Many people visit Moscow to see famous places like the Red Square.
sentences.zh: 许多人去莫斯科参观红场等著名景点。

sentences.en: Singapore is a small island country in Southeast Asia.
sentences.zh: 新加坡是东南亚的一个小岛国。

sentences.en: The capital city of Singapore is Singapore City.
sentences.zh: 新加坡的首都是新加坡市。

sentences.en: Sydney is a major city in Australia.
sentences.zh: 悉尼是澳大利亚的一个主要城市。

sentences.en: I want to visit Sydney one day.
sentences.zh: 我希望有一天能去悉尼旅游。

sentences.en: Birds can fly high in the sky.
sentences.zh: 鸟儿能在天空高飞。

sentences.en: I want to fly a kite in the park.
sentences.zh: 我想在公园放风筝。

zh: （写信结尾的热情问候语）爱你的

sentences.en: Love is a warm feeling between people.
sentences.zh: 爱是人与人之间一种温暖的情感。

sentences.en: We should love our family and friends.
sentences.zh: 我们应该爱我们的家人和朋友。

sentences.en: A tomato is a red fruit often used in salads.
sentences.zh: 西红柿是一种常用于沙拉的红色水果。

sentences.en: I like to eat tomato soup for lunch.
sentences.zh: 我午餐喜欢喝西红柿汤。

sentences.en: I like to eat potato chips.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢吃薯片。

sentences.en: The potato is a kind of vegetable.
sentences.zh: 土豆是一种蔬菜。

sentences.en: I like to eat green beans for dinner.
sentences.zh: 我晚餐喜欢吃青豆。

sentences.en: Green beans are a healthy vegetable.
sentences.zh: 青豆是一种健康的蔬菜。

sentences.en: I like to eat a carrot every day.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢每天吃一根胡萝卜。

sentences.en: The rabbit is eating a fresh carrot.
sentences.zh: 兔子正在吃一根新鲜的胡萝卜。

sentences.en: A horse can run very fast.
sentences.zh: 马能跑得非常快。

sentences.en: The horse is eating grass in the field.
sentences.zh: 那匹马正在田野里吃草。

sentences.en: A cow is a farm animal that produces milk.
sentences.zh: 奶牛是一种产奶的农场动物。

sentences.en: The cow eats grass in the field every day.
sentences.zh: 这头牛每天在田里吃草。

sentences.en: A sheep is eating grass in the field.
sentences.zh: 一只羊正在田里吃草。

sentences.en: We can get wool from sheep.
sentences.zh: 我们可以从羊身上得到羊毛。

sentences.en: A hen lays eggs in the coop.
sentences.zh: 母鸡在鸡舍里下蛋。

sentences.en: The little girl feeds the hen with corn.
sentences.zh: 小女孩用玉米喂母鸡。

sentences.en: These are my books.
sentences.zh: 这些是我的书。

sentences.en: I like these apples.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢这些苹果。

sentences.en: I use yum to install packages on Linux.
sentences.zh: 我使用yum在Linux上安装软件包。

sentences.en: Yum is a package management tool for RPM-based systems.
sentences.zh: Yum是基于RPM系统的包管理工具。

sentences.en: A dog is an animal.
sentences.zh: 狗是一种动物。

sentences.en: Cats and birds are animals.
sentences.zh: 猫和鸟都是动物。

sentences.en: She likes to play in the garden.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢在花园里玩。

sentences.en: We grow flowers in our garden.
sentences.zh: 我们在花园里种花。

sentences.en: My uncle works on a farm.
sentences.zh: 我的叔叔在农场工作。

sentences.en: We grow vegetables on the farm.
sentences.zh: 我们在农场种蔬菜。

sentences.en: A goat likes to eat grass.
sentences.zh: 山羊喜欢吃草。

sentences.en: The goat has a long beard.
sentences.zh: 这只山羊有长长的胡子。

sentences.en: I eat breakfast every morning.
sentences.zh: 我每天早上吃早餐。

sentences.en: She likes to eat apples.
sentences.zh: 她喜欢吃苹果。

sentences.en: I need to wash my clothes.
sentences.zh: 我需要洗我的衣服。

sentences.en: She has many beautiful clothes.
sentences.zh: 她有很多漂亮的衣服。

sentences.en: She wears blue pants to school.
sentences.zh: 她穿蓝色裤子去上学。

sentences.en: My brother needs new pants for winter.
sentences.zh: 我弟弟冬天需要新裤子。

sentences.en: She wears a red hat.
sentences.zh: 她戴着一顶红色的帽子。

sentences.en: My hat is on the table.
sentences.zh: 我的帽子在桌子上。

sentences.en: She wears a beautiful dress to the party.
sentences.zh: 她穿着一条漂亮的连衣裙去参加派对。

sentences.en: My mother bought a new dress for me yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈昨天给我买了一条新连衣裙。

sentences.en: She wears a beautiful skirt today.
sentences.zh: 她今天穿了一条漂亮的裙子。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a new skirt.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈给我买了一条新裙子。

sentences.en: She wears a warm coat in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天她穿一件暖和的外套。

sentences.en: My new coat is blue and red.
sentences.zh: 我的新外套是蓝红相间的。

sentences.en: She wears a warm sweater in winter.
sentences.zh: 她冬天穿一件暖和的毛衣。

sentences.en: My mother bought me a new sweater yesterday.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈昨天给我买了一件新毛衣。

sentences.en: I put on my sock before wearing shoes.
sentences.zh: 我穿鞋前穿上了袜子。

sentences.en: My sock is blue and white.
sentences.zh: 我的袜子是蓝白相间的。

sentences.en: I like watching funny shorts online.
sentences.zh: 我喜欢在网上看有趣的短视频。

sentences.en: She wears shorts in summer to keep cool.
sentences.zh: 她夏天穿短裤来保持凉爽。

sentences.en: He wears a warm jacket in winter.
sentences.zh: 他冬天穿一件暖和的夹克衫。

sentences.en: My new jacket has two big pockets.
sentences.zh: 我的新夹克有两个大口袋。

sentences.en: He wears a blue shirt today.
sentences.zh: 他今天穿了一件蓝色衬衫。

sentences.en: I need to buy a new shirt for the party.
sentences.zh: 我需要为聚会买一件新衬衫。

sentences.en: This book is yours.
sentences.zh: 这本书是你的。

sentences.en: Is this pen yours?
sentences.zh: 这支钢笔是你的吗？

sentences.en: Whose book is this on the desk?
sentences.zh: 书桌上的这本书是谁的？

sentences.en: Can you tell me whose pen I found in the classroom?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我我在教室里找到的这支钢笔是谁的吗？

sentences.en: This is my mine.
sentences.zh: 这是我的矿。

sentences.en: The mine is deep underground.
sentences.zh: 矿在地下很深的地方。

sentences.en: Please pack your books into the bag.
sentences.zh: 请把你的书装进书包里。

sentences.en: She needs to pack her suitcase for the trip.
sentences.zh: 她需要为旅行收拾行李箱。

sentences.en: Please wait for your turn.
sentences.zh: 请等待轮到你。

sentences.en: I will wait here for you.
sentences.zh: 我会在这里等你。

sentences.en: She wears a warm glove on her left hand.
sentences.zh: 她左手戴着一只温暖的手套。

sentences.en: I need to buy a new glove because mine is lost.
sentences.zh: 我需要买一只新手套，因为我的丢了。

sentences.en: She wears a red scarf in winter.
sentences.zh: 冬天她戴着一条红色的围巾。

sentences.en: My mother knitted a warm scarf for me.
sentences.zh: 我妈妈为我织了一条温暖的围巾。

sentences.en: I use an umbrella on rainy days.
sentences.zh: 下雨天我用雨伞。

sentences.en: The umbrella protects me from the rain.
sentences.zh: 雨伞保护我不被雨淋。

sentences.en: She wears sunglasses to protect her eyes from the sun.
sentences.zh: 她戴太阳镜以保护眼睛免受阳光照射。

sentences.en: I need to buy a new pair of sunglasses for summer.
sentences.zh: 我需要为夏天买一副新太阳镜。

sentences.en: The little girl has a pretty dress.
sentences.zh: 这个小女孩有一条漂亮的连衣裙。

sentences.en: Her drawing of the garden is very pretty.
sentences.zh: 她画的花园非常漂亮。

sentences.en: This watch is too expensive for me to buy.
sentences.zh: 这块手表太贵了，我买不起。

sentences.en: Eating at that restaurant is always expensive.
sentences.zh: 在那家餐厅吃饭总是很贵。

sentences.en: This shirt is cheap and good.
sentences.zh: 这件衬衫既便宜又好。

sentences.en: She buys cheap books online.
sentences.zh: 她在网上买便宜的书。

sentences.en: It's nice to meet you.
sentences.zh: 很高兴认识你。

sentences.en: She has a nice smile.
sentences.zh: 她有一个友善的微笑。

sentences.en: Can I try on this shirt?
sentences.zh: 我可以试穿这件衬衫吗？

sentences.en: She wants to try on the new shoes.
sentences.zh: 她想试穿这双新鞋。

sentences.en: The size of the box is big.
sentences.zh: 这个盒子的尺寸很大。

sentences.en: What size do you need?
sentences.zh: 你需要什么尺寸？

sentences.en: Of course, I will help you with your homework.
sentences.zh: 当然，我会帮你做家庭作业。

sentences.en: Can you come to the party? Of course!
sentences.zh: 你能来参加派对吗？当然可以！

sentences.en: I ate too much cake.
sentences.zh: 我吃了太多蛋糕。

sentences.en: She runs too fast for me.
sentences.zh: 她跑得对我来说太快了。

sentences.en: I just finished my homework.
sentences.zh: 我刚刚完成了我的家庭作业。

sentences.en: She just arrived at the station.
sentences.zh: 她刚刚到达车站。

sentences.en: Can you tell me how much this book costs?
sentences.zh: 你能告诉我这本书多少钱吗？

sentences.en: I need to know how much time we have left.
sentences.zh: 我需要知道我们还剩下多少时间。

sentences.en: There are eighty students in the classroom.
sentences.zh: 教室里有八十名学生。

sentences.en: My grandmother is eighty years old this year.
sentences.zh: 我的奶奶今年八十岁了。

zh: 元（美国、加拿大等国的货币单位）

sentences.en: The dollar is the currency of the United States.
sentences.zh: 美元是美国的货币。

sentences.en: I need to exchange my money for dollars.
sentences.zh: 我需要把我的钱换成美元。

sentences.en: The store is having a big sale today.
sentences.zh: 这家商店今天正在大减价。

sentences.en: I bought this shirt on sale for 50 yuan.
sentences.zh: 我以50元的特价买了这件衬衫。
